title: International youth year
creator_credit: Department of Youth, Sport and Recreation and Open Channel Productions
brief_description: A discussion starter about problems and issues facing young people. Looks at cultural understanding and racism, technological change and consumerism, apprenticeship rights, single mothers, alcoholism and drug dependence, authority, nuclear disarmament, student participation, homelessness, disabled people and unemployment.
